post.title: Where the most harmful industrial polluters are located

children.text: The Houston region is home to 10 of the 100 industrial polluters with the potential to impact the most people.
has identified the "Toxic 100" facilities that stand the risk of harming the health of the most Americans.

"The Houston metropolitan area is home to 10 of the Toxic 100. A total of 410 facilities in the metro region account for 6 percent of the toxic emissions reported nationally," write Traci D. Blackmon and Benjamin F. Chavis, Jr.
